member.name: TAPE_GET_MEDIA_PARAMETERS
member.summary: TheTAPE_GET_MEDIA_PARAMETERS structure describes the tape in the tape drive. It is used by the function.

member.name: TAPE_GET_MEDIA_PARAMETERS.Capacity
member.summary: Total number of bytes on the current tape partition.

member.name: TAPE_GET_MEDIA_PARAMETERS.Remaining
member.summary: Number of bytes between the current position and the end of the current tape partition.

member.name: TAPE_GET_MEDIA_PARAMETERS.PartitionCount
member.summary: Number of partitions on the tape.

member.name: TAPE_GET_MEDIA_PARAMETERS.WriteProtected
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, the tape is write-protected. Otherwise, it is not.
